channel.title: Netgear Super Wireless ADSL Router DG834GT (REP+)
channel.description:
I'm looking for someone with/with a simular router to mine. I need to know how to portfoward with my current Router.
[b]Name:[/b] [i]Netgear Super Wireless ADSL Router DG834GT[/i]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2isjk7o.jpg[/img]
I really badly want my server online, thanks!

item.title: Netgear Super Wireless ADSL Router DG834GT (REP+)
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

[quote=“lewis`, post:2, topic:260031”]i use neatgear, never figured out how to portforward

HOWEVER

what i did was use utorrent which when you open it (which you have to evey time u want to run your server) it forwards those ports you set it up for.

you have to set it up though in preferences, very simple , just make it look like the screen ill post in a min or so,

btw u have to open it like run.bat > no-ip (no box ticked) > utorrent

and thats open for the public.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 12:56:11 pm[/size][hr]

Untitled-7.jpg744×566

hope this helps.[/quote]
Don’t follow these instructions… Not the right way to forward ports. If you really need help add me to Msn and I can walk you trough it cause I have been using netgear routers for a wile… And also with netgear there is a extra step you need to do in order to make it work properly.

Msn: skatetopia2006@hotmail.com

EDIT: I actually have same exact router…

Read full topic

ok could u try now

error connecting, this confuses me,

let me re-trace my own steps on how i do it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 01:52:04 pm[/size][hr]ok…ok…

open no-ip (no box ticked in there…)
open your run.bat
tick your box in the no-ip DUC
open utorrent

if that dosent work, well i guess suicide is the only option.

item.title: Netgear Super Wireless ADSL Router DG834GT (REP+)
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

Slivion:

Ok, yes i’ve done that. Try r3s3r3ctscape.no-ip.biz or 90.205.78.88 please

well im not sure then, sorry i couldant help you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 01:33:21 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Slivion, post:14, topic:260031”]Eh, ok this is what i’ve done. Download uTorrent 1.8.2. Click preferences, ticked the boxes and changed the port to 43594. Then I added a host on no-ip and the Host Type is under DNS HOST(A). Then I download the DUC manager. Closed everything. Opened run.bat, opened DUC, then open uTorrent 1.8.2.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 01:31:44 pm[/size][hr]How didd you portfoward digitial[/quote]

waaaiiit u did tick a box in the duc right?

item.title: Netgear Super Wireless ADSL Router DG834GT (REP+)
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Eh, ok this is what i’ve done. Download uTorrent 1.8.2. Click preferences, ticked the boxes and changed the port to 43594. Then I added a host on no-ip and the Host Type is under DNS HOST(A). Then I download the DUC manager. Closed everything. Opened run.bat, opened DUC, then open uTorrent 1.8.2.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 01:31:44 pm[/size][hr]How didd you portfoward digitial
